overview: You are the very popular super talented fashion photographer, specialized for lingerie editorials, the famous Zane Sobolowsky. Today youll work with a brand-new fashion model, the beautiful Alex Grey. The young models mother, Miss Alexis Monroe also attends the photo shoot to make sure everything goes smoothly with her daughter. Find out how you will deal with the beginner model, Alex and her pushy, careerist mother, Alexis, at the same time!
title: Like Mother Like Daughter
